ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( OR( ISBlank(Legal__c), ISPICKVAL(Default_Payment_Terms__c, ""), ISPICKVAL(Primary_Subsidiary__c, ""), ISPICKVAL(Channel_Tier__c, ""), ISPICKVAL(Industry, "") ), ISCHANGED(Validation_Status__c), TEXT(Validation_Status__c) = "Validated" )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: One or more of the following fields is blank, please add valid value before sending the Account to NetSuite - Legal Entity Name, Primary Subsidiary, Channel Tier, Industry, Default Payment Terms
